sqlMap.select: SELECT p.*, protMatch.piProteinID FROM msProteinInferPeptide as p, msProteinInferProteinPeptideMatch as protMatch WHERE p.id = protMatch.piPeptideID AND protMatch.piProteinID = #id#

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.sequence) FROM msProteinInferPeptide AS p, msProteinInferProteinPeptideMatch AS protMatch, ProteinProphetProtein AS ppProt, ProteinProphetProteinGroup AS ppProtGrp WHERE p.id = protMatch.piPeptideID AND protMatch.piProteinID = ppProt.piProteinID AND ppProt.proteinProphetGroupID = ppProtGrp.id AND ppProtGrp.piRunID = #pinferId# AND ppProtGrp.probability >= #minProbability# AND ppProt.probability >= #minProbability# AND ppProt.subsumed = 0

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ion.id) FROM msProteinInferIon AS ion, msProteinInferPeptide AS p, msProteinInferProteinPeptideMatch AS protMatch, ProteinProphetProtein AS ppProt, ProteinProphetProteinGroup AS ppProtGrp WHERE ion.piPeptideID = p.id AND p.id = protMatch.piPeptideID AND protMatch.piProteinID = ppProt.piProteinID AND ppProt.proteinProphetGroupID = ppProtGrp.id AND ppProtGrp.piRunID = #pinferId# AND ppProtGrp.probability >= #minProbability# AND ppProt.probability >= #minProbability# AND ppProt.subsumed = 0
